features: 🍀【Innovative 2 in 1 design】According to customer suggestions, we added a humidifier and remote control to the air purifier. Just fix the humidifier on the air purifier and add water. You can say goodbye to dryness while enjoying clean air. (Removal of the humidifier does not affect the use of the air purifier. But the humidifier module could not be used independently)REPLACEMNT FILTER: Search for B08TWL5JRZ on amazon.

🍀【Four-sided air intake，More efficient】Imported filter can quickly catch peculiar odour and smoke. It only takes 30 minutes to purify a 538 ft² room. Removing 99.99% of pet dander, dust, pollen, mold, eliminate dust, bacteria, mold and More! Reducing the impact of smoke on children and gravidas, whether they are in the living room or bedroom, they can enjoy fresh air at home freely.

🍀【High tech no water mist humidification】It will not cause moisture to surrounding affairs. Helps you fight dry skin, wrinkles and nosebleeds. Great for babies and pregnant women's bedroom.Humidification replacement filter: Search for B097RL8BX6 on amazon.

🍀【Unique Color-Changing designed for children】Features seven vibrant colors to choose from：blue/cyan/green/yellow/orange/red/purple. With room air purifiers running at the lowest fan speed, this air cleaner is just at 22dB. Set a time and turn off the display light, enjoying relaxed night or reading without interference from lights and odours

🤩🤩【<0.69KWh /24H】: Even if the air purifier and humidifier are used together for 24 hours, the power consumption is less than 0.69kW. Saved the electricity bill of the humidifier.The filter of the humidifier can be washed up to two times. Need to be replaced after two times

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received my order on this a few days ago around the 1week this January, it’s perfect! We could tell a huge difference within the end of the day! We now have one in our bedroom as well. Breathing better, a lot less or no more sneezing and not that the house an any odors but it had that “clean air smell” to it. Very happy with the the purchase and results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a very reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: It is low-maintenance, easy to clean, and for its ability to humidify the air quickly and almost silently. It has a top-filling tank large enough to last all day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for 9 months and stopped working. Poor customer service
reviews.reviewText: ** Update: 01/2023: Afloia saw my review and reached out to me thru amazon and mailed us a brand new machine within 1-2 weeks. New machine is working well :)This combo was great and did it's job well when it worked. It was quiet and made a difference in our room. However, it stopped working in 9 months. I bought it on 12/2022 and stopped working in September.It does not turn on or respond to any buttons anymore . It just stopped working in the middle of a night. It was not physically damaged as far as we can tell.We tried calling/ msging and emailing Afloia without any response.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and easy to use with the added remote
reviews.reviewText: Great air purifier/humidifier. I like the remote control and the ease of use. It keeps the air in my house crisp & clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Humidifier and Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: When I received my humidifier / air purifier in one it was basically already assembled which was great . I simply added water and plugged it in and it works great . I can tell a big difference in the air humidity and pureness of the air within 10 or 15 minutes . I strongly recommend this to anyone that wants to improve the air quality of there environment .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doing its job only on highest level
reviews.reviewText: Doing its job only on highest of 3 levels which is noisy, poor quality remote control. You can't use buttons on the humidifier when the top cover is on. Light which is good and not because it can fall down if a baby wants to move it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Two different units both broke
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this item as a Christmas gift for my parents in 2022. Nine months later, the unit stopped working— it would turn on for a couple of seconds and then shut off. I contacted the manufacturer and they sent a replacement free of charge! However, 2 months later the new unit had the same problem. We will not be asking for another replacement. Clearly this is not a reliable product, as we have followed all of the proper maintenance and use of both devices. Buyers beware! The rarity of a combined humidifier and purifier may be a clue that such a device isn’t functional. We’ll be purchasing separate humidifiers and purifiers going forward and will avoid this brand altogether. However, I give their customer service 5 stars for sending a speedy replacement the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
Works well but Remote is not very good
reviews.reviewText: Works well but Remote is not very good

This unit ,after a couple of weeks, failed 100%, to provide both my wife and myself with any relief. Also the remote failed to work, unless you were standing immediately beside it. I changed the battery , which did not improve the operation of the remote. I followed the in closed instructions carefully.NOTE111111 - Since i wrote this review, I was contacted by this supplier and I have to give them a definite 5 star rating for their excellent support. I could go into a long summary relating to this support but, all I can say is the follow up offer to me was excellent. They are sending me a replacement unit, which is a different model, but one they suggest would work the best for my situation.. I will always be a customer of their products even if the price may be higher, as the customer service they offer is priceless!!!Thanks to Whitney who was the individual who contacted me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Air purifier is good, humidifier is not.
reviews.reviewText: I have a MIla for downstairs but didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars for one for the bedroom. This air purifier is small and fits well in the corner of my bedroom. But the humidifier is nothing but a bucket of water. I could have done that myself. The filter went moldy after about two weeks, so I tossed it in the garbage. Not going to bother replacing it. The bucket of water is fine on top but it proibably doesn't do much. Don't expect it to provide the humidification that you would get from a real air humidifier, so just buy both separately.
So far so good. It was easy to set up and I like the changing Color light.Night mode is very quiet
Quiet and I like how you can use purifier with or without humidifier.
